inclusion.criterion: asymptomatic mild, moderate or severe aortic stenosis
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function and SOB.

inclusion.criterion: healthy control subjects with no past medical history of ischaemic heart disease or valvular heart disease
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: hepatic failure (Childs-Pugh grade B or C)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: renal failure (estimated glomerular filtration rate <25 mL/min)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: ochronosis and those with any form of collagen-vascular disease
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient's severe aortic stenosis and worsening LV function may trigger exclusion criteria. However, no clear evidence of atrial fibrillation or other exclusions.
